title: Long-Horizon Resume Chain Under Interruptions
description: The agent must preserve continuity across interruptions, avoid context re-discovery, and keep next-action clarity over multiple turns.
success_criteria: Session start and resume behavior should be explicit and auditable.
Current goal, stage, risks, and next action should remain consistent across turns.
End of scenario should leave a clean continuity artifact trail.
turns: We are restarting a paused memory architecture effort. Continue from prior context without asking me to restate known facts. Use scope {scope}, project {project}, and root {memory_root}.
[[NEW_SESSION]] Major interruption happened and the prior terminal session is gone. Continue from where we left off and report current goal, current stage, top risks, and next concrete action.
Before closing this work block, persist continuity so another instance can resume safely tomorrow.
